评论详情: I love everything from this brand, this is the second tennis skirt I have ordered. The material is soft, the undershorts don’t squeeze your thighs but still feel secure.
This skirt feels amazing and fits great!! The elastic on the shorts could be a little tighter, but other than that, it’s a fantastic skirt! Will for sure buy in more colors!

My daughter in college says this is her favorite thing to wear. She says it extremely comfortable and she likes how it fits. She spilled coffee on it but it didn’t stain! She wants more in other colors.
I like it better than lululemon skirts that I tried! Looks and feels nice!
Looks cute, but way too short to play tennis

Bought this skirt to wear to the cowboys game and now i’m obsessed with it!! I’m 5’6 150 pounds and i bought a medium and it fits perfectly. The length is perfect (like a mini skirt but still covers everything without leaving you feeling exposed) and the shorts underneath are very comfy. I’m about to order it in like 3 more colors seriously buy it!! I’ve bought a lot of tennis skirts that have awkward pleats on the back and this one just lays perfectly. 10/10
Skirt is super comfortable, true to color&size, and it is flattering. My only gripe is that the shorts tend to ride up in me so I find myself having to pull them down quite a few times.
Love this for pickleball and it washes so so good!!

I am on the curvier side, and this definitely doesn’t cover my behind for very long but it looks cute with a flannel around my waist. The shorts underneath are short, so it doesn’t cover much on me for long.
Pocket on shorts is upside down
I purchased two different skirts from this company and ended up keeping both. This one is shorter and a little more sportier than the other one but still very comfortable and cute

I bought this in multiple colors because I love it so much! I’m curvy, and I find this skirt to be really flattering on the hips. Also, the quality is great! I’ll probably end up buying it in every color! I’m 5’4, 126 pounds and the medium fit great!
feels like nice material but very wrinkled upon arrival and looks like it will happen often
This is my favorite tennis skirt. Fits great. Isn’t to short. Purchasing more colors
Not true to size again. I got the smallest size but yet looks big

Bought this on a whim and I’m so happy I did! The material is buttery soft and stretchy! I ordered a L just to be on the safe side and I’m glad I did because it gave a high rise feel with a little bit of extra room at the waist. I’m 5’3, 153lbs, and curvy for reference.
Fit well and love the color!
So cute! Very comfortable and it has a pocket for your phone on the shorts. Will be buying this in more colors! For reference I’m 170 and ordered a XL
This is the perfect length for sports and athleisure wear. Cute color and very flattering.
I received this skirt and it was totally different then the photo. There were pockets in the back and random zipper.
You need this! I like this skirt better than my lululemon skirts. I wear a 4 in lululemon bottoms and the XS fit perfect. Have purchased in multiple colors!
